mapper.select: SELECT c.COMP_ID AS COMP_ID, c.COMP_NAME AS COMP_NAME, c.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS FROM COMPANYS c WHERE c.COMP_TYPE = '100003' ORDER BY c.COMP_NAME

SELECT c.COMP_ID AS COMP_ID, c.COMP_NAME AS COMP_NAME, dc.CODE_NAME AS COMP_TYPE_NAME, c.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS, c.PHONE AS PHONE, c.CEO_NAME AS CEO_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS WHERE ORDER_TO_ID = c.COMP_ID) AS TOTAL_PURCHASE_COUNT FROM COMPANYS c LEFT JOIN DATA_CODES dc ON c.COMP_TYPE = dc.CODE_VALUE AND dc.CODE_GROUP = '10' WHERE c.COMP_ID = #{supplierId} AND c.COMP_TYPE = '100003'

SELECT NVL(SUM(pod.QUANTITY), 0) AS order_quantity FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003'

SELECT NVL(SUM(pod.QUANTITY), 0) AS order_quantity FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND po.ORDER_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT po.ORDER_ID) AS TOTAL_ORDERS, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN po.ORDER_STATUS = '030002' THEN po.ORDER_ID END) AS COMPLETED_ORDERS FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT po.ORDER_ID) AS TOTAL_ORDERS, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN po.ORDER_STATUS = '030002' THEN po.ORDER_ID END) AS COMPLETED_ORDERS FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND po.ORDER_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003'

SELECT NVL(AVG(po.DUE_DATE - TRUNC(po.ORDER_DATE)), 0) AS avg_delivery_time FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS = '030002' AND po.DUE_DATE IS NOT NULL

SELECT NVL(AVG(po.DUE_DATE - TRUNC(po.ORDER_DATE)), 0) AS avg_delivery_time FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND po.ORDER_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS = '030002' AND po.DUE_DATE IS NOT NULL

SELECT NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT po.ORDER_ID), 0) AS order_count FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003'

SELECT NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT po.ORDER_ID), 0) AS order_count FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND po.ORDER_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT po.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, TO_CHAR(po.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, TO_CHAR(po.TOTAL_AMOUNT, 'FM999,999,999') || '원' AS TOTAL_AMOUNT, po.ORDER_STATUS AS STATUS, dc.CODE_NAME AS STATUS_NAME FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN DATA_CODES dc ON po.ORDER_STATUS = dc.CODE_VALUE AND dc.CODE_GROUP = '03' WHERE po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS IN ('030001', '030002') ORDER BY po.ORDER_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT pod.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID, pod.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, SUM(pod.QUANTITY) AS TOTAL_QUANTITY, SUM(pod.QUANTITY * pod.PRICE) AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003' GROUP BY pod.PRODUCT_ID, pod.PRODUCT_NAME ORDER BY TOTAL_AMOUNT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT TO_CHAR(po.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS MONTH, SUM(pod.QUANTITY) AS ORDER_COUNT FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(po.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY MONTH ASC

SELECT pod.CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, SUM(pod.QUANTITY * pod.PRICE) AS SUPPLY_AMOUNT, COUNT(pod.PO_ID) AS ITEM_COUNT FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) AND po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_STATUS != '030003' GROUP BY pod.CATEGORY ORDER BY SUPPLY_AMOUNT DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT po.ORDER_ID AS ORDER_ID, TO_CHAR(po.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ORDER_DATE, po.ORDER_STATUS AS STATUS, dc.CODE_NAME AS STATUS_NAME, po.DUE_DATE AS DUE_DATE, TO_CHAR(po.TOTAL_AMOUNT, 'FM999,999,999') || '원' AS TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID LEFT JOIN DATA_CODES dc ON po.ORDER_STATUS = dc.CODE_VALUE AND dc.CODE_GROUP = '03' WHERE po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND po.ORDER_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) ORDER BY po.ORDER_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'ALERT_' || ROWNUM AS ID, CASE WHEN po.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE THEN '납기일 지연 알림' WHEN (po.DUE_DATE - SYSDATE) <= 2 AND po.ORDER_STATUS = '030001' THEN '긴급 발주 처리 필요' WHEN po.ORDER_STATUS = '030003' THEN '발주 취소 알림' ELSE '일반 알림' END AS TITLE, CASE WHEN po.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE THEN '발주번호 ' || po.ORDER_ID || '의 납기일이 ' || TRUNC(SYSDATE - po.DUE_DATE) || '일 지연되었습니다.' WHEN (po.DUE_DATE - SYSDATE) <= 2 AND po.ORDER_STATUS = '030001' THEN '발주번호 ' || po.ORDER_ID || '의 처리가 시급합니다.' WHEN po.ORDER_STATUS = '030003' THEN '발주번호 ' || po.ORDER_ID || '가 취소되었습니다.' ELSE '발주번호 ' || po.ORDER_ID || ' 관련 알림입니다.' END AS MESSAGE, po.ORDER_DATE AS CREATED_AT, CASE WHEN po.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE THEN 'HIGH' WHEN (po.DUE_DATE - SYSDATE) <= 2 AND po.ORDER_STATUS = '030001' THEN 'HIGH' WHEN po.ORDER_STATUS = '030003' THEN 'MEDIUM' ELSE 'LOW' END AS PRIORITY, CASE WHEN po.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE THEN 'DELIVERY_DELAY' WHEN (po.DUE_DATE - SYSDATE) <= 2 AND po.ORDER_STATUS = '030001' THEN 'ORDER_URGENT' WHEN po.ORDER_STATUS = '030003' THEN 'ORDER_CANCELLED' ELSE 'INFO' END AS ALERT_TYPE FROM PURCHASE_ORDERS po INNER JOIN PURCHASE_ORDERS_D pod ON po.ORDER_ID = pod.ORDER_ID WHERE po.ORDER_TO_ID = #{supplierId} AND ( po.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE OR ((po.DUE_DATE - SYSDATE) <= 2 AND po.ORDER_STATUS = '030001') OR po.ORDER_STATUS = '030003' ) AND po.ORDER_DATE >= SYSDATE - 30 ORDER BY CASE WHEN po.DUE_DATE < SYSDATE THEN 1 WHEN (po.DUE_DATE - SYSDATE) <= 2 AND po.ORDER_STATUS = '030001' THEN 2 WHEN po.ORDER_STATUS = '030003' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, po.ORDER_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 20
